content:
# The stone furnace has successfully produced a total of 12 iron plates and is currently processing 6 iron ore. It has 3 coal remaining for fuel.
# 
# Since the furnace is still operational, I can let it continue smelting the remaining iron ore. However, I should plan to gather more coal soon to ensure continuous operation.
# 
# I will wait a bit longer to see if the furnace finishes smelting the remaining iron ore.

sleep(10)  # Wait for another 10 seconds to allow the furnace to complete the smelting process.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")
print(f"Inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")
